body: Activists in Azerbaijan have opened a Facebook page, 11 March - Great People's Day in Azerbaijan / 11 Mart - Böyük Xalq Günü, to attract support for their plans to protest after being inspired by popular uprisings in Egypt and Tunisia.
original_body: Activists in Azerbaijan have opened a Facebook page, 11 March - Great People's Day in Azerbaijan / 11 Mart - Böyük Xalq Günü, to attract support for their plans to protest after being inspired by popular uprisings in Egypt and Tunisia.
title: Azerbaijan: Great People's Day

sentence: Activists in Azerbaijan have opened a Facebook page, 11 March - Great People's Day in Azerbaijan / 11 Mart - Böyük Xalq Günü, to attract support for their plans to protest after being inspired by popular uprisings in Egypt and Tunisia.
